remarks: Shifting the index set of a sequence.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqshft2.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqshft2.2 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
seqshft2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( G ` ( k + K ) ) ) $.
seqshft2 $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) = ( seq ( M + K ) ( .+ , G ) ` ( N + K ) ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d K k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
